headline: Computational Legal Studies Workshop 2025 (CLS 2025)
content: Our lab presented a paper at CLS 2025

headline: Environmental Law & Governance Seminar
content: Our lab hosted the Miin Wu School Seminar on Environmental Law and Sustainability Governance, featuring a keynote lecture by Prof. Jiunn-Rong Yeh, with Prof. Hsiao-Wen Wang serving as the discussant and Prof. Shao-Man Lee as the moderator.

headline: International Conference on Emerging Infectious Diseases 2025 (ICEID 2025)
content: Our lab presented a poster at ICEID 2025.

headline: ICON•S TAIWAN CHAPTER 2025 ANNUAL CONFERENCE
content: Our lab faculty member Prof. Shao-Man Lee served as one of the organizers of the ICON•S Taiwan Chapter 2025 Annual Conference.
